pageTitle: BB Dakota Broderick V Pattern Sweater | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Length: 27in / 68.5cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Imported, China. Hand wash. 70% acrylic/30% wool. Fabric: Knit. Metallic strands shine from intarsia zigzags on this bold BB Dakota sweater. Ribbed edges and long sleeves. Description Clothing > Sale > video play
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer BB Dakota's look can best be described as citified prep: classic Americana with a quirky, feminine twist. The BB Dakota girl is glamorous, sophisticated, and intelligent. At times she's demure, at times sexy, but always feminine and always confident. The brand strives to give their girl a cache of must-have jackets, dresses, leggings, and tops that are both cutting edge and competitively priced. In short, BB Dakota clothes are tailor-made for a fun night out.
